definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
right in front of sb's eyes/right under sb's nose/current/at the moment
to talk glibly/to talk big/to be all talk
see 動嘴皮|动嘴皮[dong4 zui3 pi2]
to wear out the skin of one's teeth (idiom); pointlessly blather/to talk incessant nonsense/blah blah
to wear out one's lips (idiom)/to talk until one is blue in the face/to repeat again and again

sentences.english: You're stronger than you look with a smart ass mouth to match.
sentences.chinese: 你比看上去要强大，还有张会耍嘴皮子的臭嘴。

sentences.english: They were embezzling funds right under his nose.
sentences.chinese: 他们就在他眼皮子底下把公款贪污了。

sentences.english: Has studied vrum processing craft, screens the most superior craft parameter combination.
sentences.chinese: 研究了奶皮子的加工工艺，筛选出最优工艺参数组合。

sentences.english: Too bad your fists aren't as fast as your mouth.
sentences.chinese: 只可惜您那铁拳头及不上你的嘴皮子快啊。

sentences.english: But we can't be satisfied with studies and paper and talk.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我们不能只满足于研究和文件以及动动嘴皮子。

sentences.english: An upstart like that dares to bandy words with me!
sentences.chinese: 这样一个小财主也敢跟我逗嘴皮子。

sentences.english: The answer was right under our noses the whole time.
sentences.chinese: 答案一直就在我们眼皮子底下。

sentences.english: The shoemaker carefully examined the leather before starting to cut out the uppers.
sentences.chinese: 鞋匠仔细察看了这张皮子以后才开始裁剪鞋帮儿。

sentences.english: In neat little rows I tacked the hides on the smokehouse wall.
sentences.chinese: 我把那些皮子整齐地钉在了熏肉间的墙上。

sentences.english: How about this wallet?It's made a fine leather.
sentences.chinese: 这个钱包怎么样？它是用很好的皮子做的。

sentences.english: She tried to slit the sheet of leather into thongs.
sentences.chinese: 她试图把那张皮子分割成条。

sentences.english: Instead, they are only concerned with their ratings. Fans of Zeng, meanwhile, continue to show their support.
sentences.chinese: 歌迷也无所谓，支持一位偶像不过是动动嘴皮子而已。

sentences.english: A thick bed quilt, sponge and leather products can also be handled.
sentences.chinese: 厚被，海绵，皮子等的绗缝作业也可以进行。

sentences.english: So he cut it out and found it would make just one pair.
sentences.chinese: 他把皮子裁剪好，发现它刚好够做一双鞋。

sentences.english: The white jade hall continues tel again inside and Tang whet the mouth skin son way after the dragon.
sentences.chinese: 白玉堂继续再电话里和唐继龙磨着嘴皮子道。

sentences.english: Of great difficulty, reluctantly to the skin.
sentences.chinese: 化了很大的劲，才勉强地把皮子吞了下去。

definition: outer skin/surface/leather cover (of a book)/drum skin/leather upper (of a shoe)
to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist
